;set RadioNewVegas.nTracksPlayed to RadioNewVegas.nTracksPlayed + 1; set RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack3 to RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack2 set RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack2 to RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack1 set RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack1 to 22
{Where Have You Been All My Life}

;set RadioNewVegas.nTracksPlayed to RadioNewVegas.nTracksPlayed + 1; set RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack3 to RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack2 set RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack2 to RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack1 set RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack1 to 23

;set RadioNewVegas.nTracksPlayed to RadioNewVegas.nTracksPlayed + 1; set RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack3 to RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack2 set RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack2 to RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack1 set RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack1 to 24

;set RadioNewVegas.nTracksPlayed to RadioNewVegas.nTracksPlayed + 1; set RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack3 to RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack2 set RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack2 to RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack1 set RadioNewVegas.nLastTrack1 to 25
{Soft, slow}I... we... hope you've enjoyed your stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Soft, slow}我…我们…希望您享受这段旅程。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Soft, slow}Farewells can be a time of sadness. Letting go... difficult. {Beat, quiet}As a guest of the Sierra Madre, you know that truth more than anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Soft, slow}告别也许令人伤感，放手…也很难。 {Beat, quiet}作为马德雷山脉的贵宾，相信您一定比他人更清楚这个道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (file) Comment (NAM2) : The last sentence has a double-meaning, so draw this out - the player had to let go of unllimited wealth to survive. EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Soft}Frederick Sinclair believed one's life could be made anew every day, that fortunes were more than the wealth in your hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Soft}弗雷德里克·辛克莱相信，生命中的每一天都能可以焕然一新，一个人拥有的财富远不止手中的金钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Soft, becomes more tender}Love. Life... family, those to care for, and those who will care for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Soft, becomes more tender}还有爱、生活…和家庭，以及那些与你心心相印的人们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Soft, becomes more tender}To those who know these joys, the Sierra Madre holds little they don't already have.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Soft, becomes more tender}对于能够理解这些幸福的人来说，马德雷山脉中也许并没有他们需要的宝藏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Firm}Out in the world, beyond these walls, {emph}that is your chance to begin again.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Firm}唯有高墙之外的世界，{emph}才是您真正从头再来的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet}I hope you'll return, in happier times. {Beat, final farewell}Until then, the Sierra Madre... and I... will hold you in our hearts.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quiet}希望下次再会时，您的人生能变得更加美满富足。{Beat, final farewell}在那之前，马德雷山脉…与我…会一直将您铭记于心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guests, and residents of the Villa alike, I ask you to step outside and look to the night sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 各位贵宾，各位别墅区的居民，请与我一同走向户外，眺望今晚的夜空。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the moment you've been waiting for, the reason we're all here - the Gala Event, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre Casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你们期待已久的时刻，也是我们欢聚于此的原因。这场庆典，标志着马德雷山脉赌场的盛大开幕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are the ones who have made this momentous occasion possible, and for that, we thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你们令这一伟大的时刻变为现实。在此，我们向您表示衷心的感谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So raise your glass in celebration - {emphasize these lines, see script notes}let music fill the streets, fireworks light the sky, and promise of new beginnings fill your hearts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就让我们举杯庆祝——{emphasize these lines, see script notes}让音乐在街巷中流淌，让焰火照亮整个天空，让内心满溢新的希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Emphasize the middle section and take it slow - these normal "festival events" are the reason speakers are shrieking all over the villa and the zombi EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter what your fortunes, no matter what your cares, let go this night, and begin again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论富有贫穷，无论高低贵贱，今晚，都请您放下手中的一切，迎接新的开始吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slightly teasing}I suggest you hurry, though - the gates of the Sierra Madre are open, but only for a brief time.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slightly teasing}不过，建议你们加快脚步，虽然马德雷山脉的大门已经敞开，但它开放的时间并不长。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Mock sinister}After that, the doors will close for the evening's festivities, and won't open again until morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Mock sinister}之后，为举办庆典活动，大门将会暂时关闭，直到次日清晨才会再度开启。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Starlet [01006EDA] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Even though she's "teasing" here, the player should be scared that the casino's doors might close if they can't run there in time, so deliver this sl EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Draw this out}If so, the Sierra Madre Casino, in all its glory, is inviting you {beat}to Begin Again.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Draw this out}如果是这样，满怀荣光的马德雷山脉赌场邀请您开启新的人生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come to a place where wealth, excitement, and intrigue await around every corner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，数不尽的财富，激情和秘密正等待着您。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stroll along the winding streets of our beautiful resort, make new friends... or rekindle old flames.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您可以沿着度假区美丽的街道在微风中漫步，结交新的朋友…重燃旧的激情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let your eyes take in the luxurious expanse of the open desert, under clear starlit skies. Gaze straight on into the sunset from our Villa rooftops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在星光璀璨的天空下尽情领略沙漠广袤的美景，在别墅区的天台上欣赏壮丽的夕阳。
还有无数娱乐设施正等待着您。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gamble in our casino, take in the theater, or stay in one of our exclusive executive suites that will shelter you - and cater to your every whim.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您可以在我们的赌场中豪掷千金，在剧院里陶冶情操，或是入住我们的高级行政套房，在这里实现您的一切突发奇想。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if life's worries have weighed you down... if you need an escape from your troubles... or if you just need an opportunity to begin again, join us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果生活的重担压得您喘不过气…如果您需要一个摆脱烦恼的心灵港湾…或是一个机会来开启新的人生，那就加入我们吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let go and leave the world behind at the Sierra Madre grand opening, this October. {Beat}We'll be waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这个金秋十月，让我们放下一切，在马德雷山脉的开业庆典上欢聚一堂。我们诚挚恭候您的光临。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you hear me? Signal should be stronger in here. I'll set this on loop... {warning to player}just in case I need to step away for a moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能听到吗？ 这里的信号应该强一些。我会把这段语音调成循环播放... {warning to player}以免我有事不在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the bombs hit, this casino sealed up like an Emperor's tomb. If you don't know what that means, never mind, it means we're trapped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核弹落下的时候，整座赌场就像皇陵一样被牢牢封上了。如果你听不懂这句话也没关系，反正我的意思是，我们现在被困住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So - get the power running to the main floor. That'll open the elevators and unlock the doors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你得想办法重启主楼的电力，这样电梯才会启动，各扇门的门锁也会解除。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Mutters, detour to himself}The ones that didn't strip their gears when they locked into place, Old World junk. Shoddy workmanship.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Mutters, detour to himself}不过也只有锁芯没断的门才能打得开，旧世界的垃圾。粗制滥造的玩意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once the power's on, then I'll tell you your next steps. Just get this part done, and then listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等通电之后，我会告诉你下一步怎么做。先把这件事办完，再来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're wondering where your crew is, well... the casino saw them as guests. Which means they all got assigned to their floor. {Frowns}Just like mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你的其他队友嘛…赌场把他们当成了客人，已经将他们送往不同的楼层了{Frowns}。就像我一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry about them, they're of no use if you can't get the power running.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心他们，如果恢复不了电力，他们也没有用处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I need is you for the rest of this. Which means we just need to deal with them, one by one, and then the Vault's... {backstabbing implication, he's not going to share}ours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 剩下的事情，我只需要你一个人来做就够了。因此我们得把其他人处理掉，然后避难所就会是……{backstabbing implication, he's not going to share}我们俩的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}Ha! You got the power on, excellent. {Pleased}You were quite a find, glad my trap in the desert caught you before time ran out.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}哈！你恢复了电力，很好。{Pleased}你真是个不可多得的人才，幸好我在大限将至之前，用设在沙漠里的陷阱逮到了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}And also glad you didn't come across this place first, might have plundered it first... can't have that. Like at HELIOS. And Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}也庆幸老天没有让你提前发现这个地方，否则也许会被你捷足先登……这可不行。太阳神一号和胡佛大坝就是前车之鉴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}All right, setting this on repeat in case you're some idiot-savant braincase and need the reminder...
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}好吧，为了避免你过于健忘，需要他人随时在耳边提醒，我已经把这段语音设为了循环播放……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}So, my greedy friend, we've got some unfinished business. I'm not one to share, and there's loose ends we need to wrap up first.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}那么，我这位嗜财如命的朋友，我们还有些事情没有完成。我这人并不喜欢同他人分享财富，所以首先，我们必须要收拾掉不必要的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}The rest of your team is on different floors. They got assigned there, ushered there based on the casino's records as to the best "fit."
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}你的同伴们已经分散到别的楼层去了。赌场会根据记录将他们引导到“合适”的楼层。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}Don't ask me how, Pre-War {emph, disgust at "casino"}casino security and escort systems aren't my specialty.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}别问我这是什么原理，我对战前赌场的安保和接待系统研究得并不透彻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}Go to each floor, and kill them. I don't need them anymore... well, now that you're here.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}现在你就到各楼层去杀了他们。我已经不需要他们了…有你一个就足够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}We don't need anyone... except each other. Together, we'll crack the Sierra Madre, and we can both leave this place behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}不用太多人……只要我们俩。我们携手合作，一定能破解马德雷山脉的秘密，一起离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Dealt with Everyone}Now... if anything about our little heist went smoothly, you'd go to the Vault... {irritated}except it's locked by some code I'm not familiar with.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Dealt with Everyone}好了…如果这场抢劫进展顺利的话，那么接下来你就该前往避难所了...{irritated}只可惜，避难所被锁上了，而加密的方式我并不清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Dealt with Everyone}The door to the casino vault is hidden in the Executive Suites, without the means to unlock it, it's useless.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Dealt with Everyone}通往赌场避难所的大门就藏在行政套房里，如果没办法打开门锁，那我们所有的努力就白费了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Dealt with Everyone}Find a way to open it, bypass the code, then we'll talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Dealt with Everyone}找到打开它的方法，破解大门的密码，然后回来向我复命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Elevator Door Unlocked}You did it... a voice lock. Why would he have done that? Uh! Never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Elevator Door Unlocked}你成功了…居然是声控锁。他为什么要搞这种东西？啊！算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Elevator Door Unlocked}Now I just need you to go below, look around. See if there's any {emph}other surprises down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Elevator Door Unlocked}现在我要你坐电梯下去，侦察一下里面的情况。看看有没有什么{emph}别的惊喜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Elevator Door Unlocked}I'll be along once you've found the Vault. No need risking myself just yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Elevator Door Unlocked}等你找到了金库，我就去与你会和。目前我还不想拿自己的性命开玩笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.TRADUIT: {Wild Wasteland only}通话结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Once inside the casino in Act 3, Elijah sets the radio on loop, now he's sure the player can hear him - they just can't talk back and forth. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}What the hell was that?
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}出什么事了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Elijah's still speaking to himself, but the Gala Event went off and something happened, so he's getting interested. EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}The Gala Event... finally. Probably wake up half the things in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}盛世庆典...终于开始了。镇上一半的鬼人大概都会被惊动吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Elijah's still speaking to himself, but the Gala Event went off and something happened, so he's getting interested. EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}Power's fluctuating in here... getting some systems waking up, good, good.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}能量出现波动…系统启动了，很好，很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Elijah's still speaking to himself, but the Gala Event went off and something happened, so he's getting interested. EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}Now all they have to do is just get here. Tired of waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}现在他们只要进来就行了。我已经等得不耐烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Elijah's still speaking to himself, but the Gala Event went off and something happened, so he's getting interested. EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired, urgency here}Hurry... hurry... you just need to get inside, I'll handle the rest. Come on, you fools.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired, urgency here}快点…快点…你们快进来，剩下的我来处理。来啊，你们这群蠢材。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Elijah's still speaking to himself, but the Gala Event went off and something happened, so he's getting interested. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired, urgency here}Not far now... soon, the Sierra Madre's mine. Doors won't hold open forever... just like the last time. Come on.
ESP.TRADUIT: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired, urgency here}过不了多久…马德雷山脉赌场就是我的了。大门可不会一直敞开…上次也是这样。动作快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Elijah's still speaking to himself, but the Gala Event went off and something happened, so he's getting interested. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, now everything's coming together...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，事情终于有转机了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just need to keep their gears turning a little while longer...
ESP.TRADUIT: 只需要让它们的齿轮再多转一会…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Grunts}Can't believe this old Pip-Boy saved me. {Beat, under his breath}Even if it led me to that damn signal in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Grunts}真不敢想信这个老旧的哔哔小子救了我。 {Beat, under his breath}不过也是它先害得我跟着那个该死的信号走到这儿来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good thing the new recruit had a Pip-Boy, too, probably stole it from a Vault 21 dweller. {Beat}Still, a thief's just what I need for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不错，新来的那家伙手上也有一个哔哔小子， 大概是从21号避难所的居民手里偷来的。{Beat}我也正好需要一个小偷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If only the others would've obeyed orders half as well as this one... should have thought of linking the collars together the first few times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前那帮人要是能和现在这家伙一样听话，哪怕就听一半……我早就该想到把项圈接在一起的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good thing I can still hook into the Villa speakers by remote...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好在我依然可以远程遥控别墅区的喇叭…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn Hologram tech. Worthless as security... better as weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 混蛋全息影像科技。用在安保上一文不值…更适合做武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell are they doing out there. Hurry up, you idiots, I don't have a few more years to waste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们到底在干嘛。快一点，你们这些白痴，我可没剩下几年时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outwitted by doors. Hermetically sealed doors don't protect anyone, all they do is seal us in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 居然被几道大门给难倒了。密封的门保护不了任何人，只会把我们关在里面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Frustrated, grumbling}Why the owner tied all of this to the Gala Event, insanity... backwards thinking, having a {emph}festival be your key. No wonder the bombs fell.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Frustrated, grumbling}为什么这儿的拥有者会将大门的开关和盛世庆典连接在一起……现在想想，居然将一场晚会作为自家开门的钥匙，难怪要挨核弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 2 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. (Same as Act 1) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Himself}Still can't figure out why I lost the signals...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Himself}还是不明白我为什么会丢掉信号…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no reason why it could have gone wrong, had it all planned out... {Snorts, pissed}maybe it was the curse of the Sierra Madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不可能会出问题啊，一切都计划好了... {Snorts, pissed}也许这就是马德雷山脉的诅咒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Coughs a bit, clears his throat.}Damn Cloud still in my lungs, rattling around.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Coughs a bit, clears his throat.}该死的毒云还在我的肺里转悠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: <AUDIO: Clatter of wrench dropping>{Dropped a wrench on the ground}Dammit, get back here.
ESP.TRADUIT: <音频： 扳手掉下的咔嗒声>{Dropped a wrench on the ground}该死，给我回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Mumbling to himself, as if working on something and trying to re-wire a circuit.}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good thing I installed radios in the collars, Pip-Boy's letting me pick them up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好在我已经往项圈里安装了无线电接收器，哔哔小子可以让我找到它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell is 21 doing now... hnh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 21号现在到底在干嘛…唔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Irritated, judgmental}Fool better not decide to sleep. Vitals go down, I'll get someone else to do this job.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Irritated, judgmental}那蠢货最好不要想着睡觉。要是丢了性命，我就再去找别人来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unnn... sitting too long. Damn arthritis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔…坐的时间太长了。该死的关节炎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come too far to go back now. Too far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走得太远，不能回头了。太远了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh. Going to wipe the slate clean. Kimball, the Republic... Hardin, McNamara, my "brothers." Then I'll head back West.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼。要把他们统统消灭。金博尔，共和国…哈丁，麦克纳马拉，还有我的"兄弟们" 。然后再往西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Better loop some instructions in case something happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好将一部分指令循环播放以备不测。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Going to get inside this place if it's the last thing I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算剩下最后一口气，我也要进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Running out of volunteers. Last ones couldn't see beyond their own greed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快要没有志愿者了。上一队人马被贪婪蒙蔽了双眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: If only people would do what I say, wouldn't need these damn collars to keep them in line. Keep going for each other's throats like dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果人们肯听我的话，就不需要用这些项圈来约束他们了。他们总是像狗一样互相撕咬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wish I... still had that damn Holorifle. Spent forever making it... need to find it when this is all done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真希望…那把全息步枪还在我身边。为了研制它，我花费了无数心血…等这一切都结束，我就去把它找回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : All of Elijah's Act 1 messages are spoken as if he's talking to himself, the player is eavesdropping on him. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slow chuckle on the radio, uneasy undercurrent}Heh... now, come on, you open up. {Colder, angrier}Open up, damn you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slow chuckle on the radio, uneasy undercurrent}呵……快点，开门。 {Colder, angrier}开门啊，该死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : This radio msg plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped

Open the vault... {trying to make a deal}I can make it worth your while, {now angry}think about what you're throwing away. {Trying to bait player, make a deal}I have other weapons, other technology I can share with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打开避难所吧…… {trying to make a deal}我不会让你空手而归的，{now angry}想想看你错过了什么。{Trying to bait player, make a deal}我还有别的武器，别的科技可以和你分享。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : This radio msg plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
{Low, trying to greed player with lure of other treasures}And the Big Empty... I know the way there. I know some of its secrets... if...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Low, trying to greed player with lure of other treasures}而且大空山…我知道去那儿的路，我还知道它的很多秘密……只要……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Big Empty = Another place of buried treasures in Fallout, like the Sierra Madre. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
{Backpedals}The collars... the collars were a mistake, I see that now. Why would I kill you? After {emph}all you've done... after all {emph}we've done together.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Backpedals}项圈……项圈就是个错误，我现在明白了……为什么我要杀你？你做了{emph}这么多……{emph}我们一起实现了这么多……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : This radio msg plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
{Challenging, hates being ignored}Are you listening to me?!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Challenging, hates being ignored}你有在听我说话吗？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : This radio msg plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
{Looking around, reverent, quiet}Everything down here... I swear... so much you could use, you could rule the wastes with what's down here...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Looking around, reverent, quiet}我发誓，这里的一切……你都可以派上用场，你甚至可以用它们来统治废土……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : At this point, Elijah is saying "you," really is thinking about what -he- could do with it all. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
{Anger/fear}Don't you leave me here. You can't do this to me. {Coughs, wheezing}
ESP.TRADUIT: {Anger/fear}你不能就这么把我丢在这里，你不能这么对我。 {Coughs, wheezing}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
Eh? Getting dark in here. Machine... machine's losing power, no. I still have Pip-Boy light... maybe... maybe... no, no, that doesn't work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃？这儿变黑了。机器……机器没有能源了。不，我还有哔哔小子的灯……或许……或许……不不不，没用，这没用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Depowering noise of Vault shutting down.>Elijah starts fumbling with his wrist-flashlight as things go dark... EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
{Scratching on metal, clawing for door, quiet, to himself}Where... where is the door. Can't find the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Scratching on metal, clawing for door, quiet, to himself}门，门在哪里。我找不到门了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : <AUDIO: Scratching on metal, as if clawing at door.> Elijah is fumbling in the dark, talking to himself. EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
{Rasping breath, to himself}Calm, been in worse situations... find a way out... {vicious, last part is threat}somehow, then find that Courier...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Rasping breath, to himself}冷静，冷静……更糟的情况我都遇到过……我一定能找到出去的路…… {vicious, last part is threat}找到那个邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : "Find" that courier in the sense of killing them. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
{Running through options, to himself}Maybe Veronica... no... no, she thinks I'm dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Running through options, to himself}或许维罗尼卡可以……不……不……她以为我早就死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : Veronica = His foster daughter, thinking about who could come rescue him. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
{Himself}Must be someone... maybe that {emph}other courier, one with the flag on his back... maybe... no... no, said he'd never come to the Sierra Madre...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Himself}一定还有别人…或许我可以去找{emph}另一个邮差, 背上贴旗子的那个……或许我可以…不……不可能，他说过，他再也不会来马德雷山脉了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
No way out. {Beat, frustration}Can't... can't end like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出不去了。{Beat, frustration}不，不能就这么结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
{Cold, firm, addressed to the player as his final words}You. I know you can hear me. When you die, Courier... I'll be waiting. Your grave's going look just like this vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cold, firm, addressed to the player as his final words}你，我知道你能听到我说话。我会等下去，等到你死的那一天……你的坟墓会和这座避难所一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
{Cold, quiet, hissing whisper}When you die... I'll be waiting here... at the Sierra Madre. {Faint, quiet, as if dying}Waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cold, quiet, hissing whisper}我会在马德雷赌场里等着……等到你死的那天。{Faint, quiet, as if dying}一直等下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). This is the first line of the loop. EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
...make your own army, re-shape the world, and if others disagree... put {emph}collars on them, I can show you how.
ESP.TRADUIT: ……建立自己的军队，改造整个世界，如果有人不同意……就给他们{emph}戴上项圈，我可以教你方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and last 3 lines of this sequence loop. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
{Ragged breathing, loop, trapped in Vault, alone}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). This is the second line of 3 line loop. EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
{Deep ragged breath, then... loop back to "Fainter"}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and this is last line of loop. EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped

ESP.TRADUIT: {Weaker}我会耐心等下去，直到你死的那一天……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Father Elijah [01001300] (file) Comment (NAM2) : This radio plays after Elijah is trapped in the Vault by PC (PC should be pleased). Elijah pleas, fades, and this is last line of loop. EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;Elijah's final pleas to the player from the vault after trapped
{Player attacked a companion}I warned you to cooperate. Now I'll have to begin again.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Player attacked a companion}我警告过你要相互合作的。现在我只能重新开始了。

set RadioNewVegas.nLastIntro to 1 set RadioNewVegas.nTracksPlayed to 0

set RadioNewVegas.nLastIntro to 6 set RadioNewVegas.nTracksPlayed to 0
set RadioNewVegas.nLastIntro to 7 set RadioNewVegas.nTracksPlayed to 0
