ESP.TRADUIT: {再会。}

ESP.ORIGINAL: God damn leg... I don't know how much longer I'm going to make it before I bleed out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这天杀的腿…我不知道在血流干净之前我还能撑多久。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bravo, this is Camp Guardian calling for backup. No sign of the rest of the men stationed here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大本营，守卫者营地呼叫增援。没有任何迹象表明有其他部队在我们附近。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Private Halford requesting backup. Anyone out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 列兵哈尔福德请求支援。有人听到吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guardian is down. I repeat Guardian is down. Requesting backup from any nearby forces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 守卫者营地沦陷了。我重复一次，守卫者营地沦陷了。恳求附近的任何部队予以支援。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those beasts drug the rest of the men away. Oh God, I hope they don't come back for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些怪物把其他的人都拖走了。我的上帝啊，我希望它们不要回来找我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever been in love with a celebrity? You don't have to be shy, I feel it between us, too. Sometimes you can't help being Mad About the Boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾经与名人坠入过情网吗？别害羞，我觉得这种感觉人皆有之。有时候，你真的很难不"为少年痴狂.
现在，来点音乐。.
那么，来点音乐。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you don't want to listen to me, do you? You want music.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你并不喜欢听我唠叨，对吗？你想听音乐。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, sometimes the journey beats the destination. Especially if your spurs go Jingle Jangle Jingle, and you meet some nice gals on the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，有时旅途的过程要比达到终点更吸引人。特别是当你叮当叮当叮在公路上疾驰时，你会在路上遇见一些好女孩。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I tried to measure my charisma on a Vit-o-matic Vigor Tester once. The machine burst into flames.
Sources report the NCR's top Ranger, Chief Hanlon, has died in a tragic revolver-cleaning accident inside his locked office at Camp Golf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有消息说NCR的首席游骑兵，军士长汉隆，在清理左轮手枪时发生意外。当时他正把自己锁在位于高尔夫营地的办公室内。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sources report the NCR's top Ranger, Chief Hanlon, has unexpectedly passed away. NCR soldiers rallied to show their support for the officer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有消息说NCR的首席游骑兵，军士长汉隆猝然离世。NCR的士兵们日前自发组织了集会，以表达对他的哀思。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word out of Camp Golf is that many NCR Rangers can expect redeployment in the near future. One anonymous soldier said it was part of a new strategy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 高尔夫营地传来消息，驻扎于此的NCR游骑兵有望于近日转移。一位不愿意透露姓名的士兵称，这是新战略的一部分。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR Rangers are being pulled off the front lines as part of a campaign to "secure existing NCR territory," according to anonymous sources.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据匿名消息，为了"保护现存的NCR领土"，NCR的游骑兵部队撤出了前线。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Welcome back, Utobitha. I have with me Best Friend Tabitha, who has something important she'd like to share.
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}欢迎回来，乌托比萨。我正和我最好的朋友塔比瑟一起，她有重要的事情要向我们宣布。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Well Rhonda, I'm a little concerned about the number of humans that keep coming to Black Mountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}好了，朗达，我注意到一群人正向黑山进发。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Humans? Here? Why do you think they'd do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}人类？朝这里？你觉得他们为何要这么做 ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Honestly, I think they're a little jealous of the ideal society we've built here, Rhonda. And I can't blame them.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}坦白的说，我觉得他们是有些嫉妒我们建立的这个理想社会，朗达。但我不能责怪他们。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] We have everything we need here. Food, shelter, safety, entertainment. It really is a paradise.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}我们现在别无他求。食物，住所，安全，还有娱乐。这里简直美若天堂。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] There's no arguing with the truth, is there?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}真理面前无可争辩，不是么？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] But humans need to be aware that Black Mountain is no place for them. In fact, it's even dangerous for them here.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}但人类必须意识到，黑山并不适合他们。反而对他们来说很危险。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] First of all, there's the radiation. That warm, peaceful glow that we all know and love doesn't have the same effect on humans.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}首先，就是辐射。那温暖祥和的光芒对我们而言是这么平常又美妙，对人类却并非如此。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] You see, humans are weak, and have an inherent defect that causes them to fall apart when exposed to radiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}你看，人类是脆弱的，这种不可避免的缺陷让他们一旦暴露在辐射中就必死无疑。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] That sounds terrible! How do they stand it? Radiation's, like, everywhere!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}听起来真可怕！他们是如何存活的？辐射，简直是，无处不在！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] I know. They truly have a hard lot in life. Which may explain why they're so irritable all the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}我知道。他们的生活自然苦不堪言。同时也解释了为什么人类总是暴躁易怒。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] I don't know about you, Utobitha, but my eyes have really been opened. We'll be back after some music!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}我不知道你怎么想的，乌托比萨，不过听了这一席话，我真觉得大开眼界。我们音乐之后马上回来！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] We're back with Best Friend Tabitha, who was telling us why humans should STAY THE HELL AWAY, ier, keep their distance from the State of Utobitha.
[Tabitha] Thank you, Rhonda. As you know, one of the many benefits of living in Utobitha is the ready availability of pet centaurs.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}非常感谢，朗达。你也知道，居住在乌托比萨的另一个福利就是可以饲养多脚兽宠物。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Ooh, I love the centaurs. They're just so cute!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}啊哈，我喜欢多脚兽们。他们真是太可爱了！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Exactly, Rhonda, who could resist those sweet little faces, and that cute way they shuffle around on all those hands they have.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}完全正确，朗达，有谁能拒绝那些可爱的小脸蛋呢，而且他们总是把自己的小手们摆来摆去。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] But humans must be so caught up with their pleasant features that they forget the most important thing about centaurs.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}但人类肯定是被这种可爱的特点给冲昏了头，而忘记了多脚兽最重要的本性。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] And what might that be, Best Friend Tabitha?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}此话怎讲呢，我的朋友塔比瑟？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Centaurs eat humans, Rhonda! You see, humans are a lot smaller, and much more tender than you or I, so centaurs naturally see them as food.
[Rhonda] Ah, that *would* make it hard for them to get along, wouldn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}啊，那*的确*解释了为什么人类和他们无法和平相处，不是么？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Indeed. Given the situation, I had to make a hard choice when I created Utobitha - do we invite weak, greedy humans who would just die anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}对啊。当我创立乌托比萨就面临着一个艰难的选择，是要邀请那些软弱，贪婪且不知死活的人类到这里来呢？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Or cute, loveable centaurs, who fight and die for us and ask nothing in return? After much deliberation, I went with the centaurs.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}还是选择那些可爱又惹人怜惜的，曾为我们出生入死，却别无所求的多脚兽呢？经过一番权衡，我还是选择了让多脚兽们进入这里。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] And there you have it, Utobitha. The next time you play with a huggable, loveable centaur, remember that Best Friend Tabitha made it all possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}所以大家该明白了吧，乌托比萨的居民们。下次你们和那些可爱的，有趣的多脚兽们玩耍之时，记得是你们最好的朋友塔比瑟赋予了你们这一切。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] We're here once again with our beloved leader. Best Friend Tabitha, why don't you tell our listeners what you just told me?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}我们再次邀请到了万人敬仰的领袖。她就是我们最好的朋友塔比瑟，为什么不和听众们谈谈刚才你和我提到的事儿？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] I was just saying that I think there's a fundamental misunderstanding about the mutants here in the State of Utobitha.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}我刚才说，我们可能对乌托比萨境内出现的变种人有一些根本上的误解。.
[朗达}那是*什么*意思？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] I believe that the mutants here are generally considered to dislike humans. And nothing could be further from the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}这里的变种人都对人类抱有厌恶。我认为他们这种想法是大错特错。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] During their stay here, mutants are taught to tolerate, and even accept, the existence of inferior, frail creatures, humans included.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}在这里，变种人们必须学会忍耐，甚至去接受那些低等的，心智未开的生物，这其中就包括人类。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Ooh, how insightful! So then how do you think this misunderstanding came about?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}哇哦，好一个真知灼见哪！那么以你之见，这些误会是怎样出现的呢？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] My guess is that it has something to do with the fact that every mutant in the State of Utobitha has been give explicit orders regarding security.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}我认为是这样的：乌托比萨境内的变种人都无一例外都肩负着重要任务，这任务无外乎就是保卫这里的安全。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Those orders naturally include shooting humans on sight. Or pounding them with whatever happens to be handy. Guns being in short supply, you see.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}为了执行任务，他们对人类必须格杀勿论。利用手头任何工具对他们予以重击。你也看到了，枪支因此变得短缺。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] As I've explained, there are numerous dangers to humans here, and we have a duty to drive them away. It's for their own good, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}如你所说，人类在这里的处境真是万分危险，我们有责任驱逐他们。这也是为他们自己好。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Makes sense to me! And the silly humans think we don't care. For shame. Stick around, Utobitha, for more after this!
[Tabitha] Do you remember the good old days where the Master ruled over us all?
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}还记得主教麾下的那些美好时光吗？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] When his gentle, compelling, and yet oddly insistent voice crawled through your mind and told you exactly what to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}还能想起他那那彬彬有礼，温而文雅，却略带奇怪的音调划过你脑海时的感受吗？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Do you miss a time when you didn't have to think for yourself, and enjoyed lazy days of following the bellowed commands of others?
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}你是否怀念过去那不用自己动脑，只需要服从他人命令的慵懒日子？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Those days can be yours again, for Best Friend Tabitha, the esteemed leader of the State of Utobitha, is here to tell you what to do!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}那样的日子就要再度降临了，因为我们最好的朋友塔比瑟在此。万人敬仰的领袖将引领你们！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] That's right! I, Tabitha, will take on the burden of your obedience!
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}非常正确！我，塔比瑟，愿意担负起指挥你们的重任！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Acceptance into Utobitha pending Best Friend Tabitha's approval.
[Rhonda] Best Friend Tabitha reserves the right to turn down applicants for any reason, including whimsy or boredom.
[Rhonda] Acceptance into Utobitha open to mutants only. Former human servants of the Master conditionally accepted for purposes of centaur feeding duties.
[Tabitha] Utobitha! Come, take a load off your mind!
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}乌托比萨！加入吧，别再让自己不堪重负了！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Welcome to another episode of Know - Your - Mutants!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}欢迎再次收听这一期的变种人面面观！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Special guest star Best Friend Tabitha is with us in the studio to share her insights on this topic that affects us all.
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}同时欢迎特别来宾，也是我们的好朋友塔比瑟，来到演播室，与我们分享她对目前关键形势的见解。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Thank you, Rhonda. Today I'd like to talk about a subject near and dear to my heart, the nightkin.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}再次感谢，朗达。今天让我们来谈谈我最关心也是我一直惦记的一件事，夜行族。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Ooooh, you must know a lot about the nightkin, Best Friend Tabitha, seeing as how you are one!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}哦哦，关于夜行族你肯定无所不知，塔比瑟，毕竟你就是其中最出色的一员！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] That's true, Rhonda. I am in a unique position to speak to the natural superiority of my kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}没错，朗达。我的地位让我有足够的资格来阐述我的族类天生的优越性。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Our story begins, as most stories do, with the Master. Our glorious leader had created the Super Mutants, but something nagged at him.
[Tabitha] "I can do better", he must have said to himself. And boy did he ever!
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}“我可以做得更好”，他肯定不断这样对自己说。而他也的确做到了！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] A new type of mutant was created - stronger, faster, smarter, more dangerous in every way.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}新的变种人就这样被创造出来——更强大，更迅猛，更加聪明，而且异常凶残。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] We were to normal super mutants what they were to humans, and they were told to defer to us in all things.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}我们之于超级变种人，就像他们之于普通人类。而且他们被创造出来就是为了服从于我们。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] And you're the leader of all the nightkin, correct?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}况且你还是夜行族的领袖，对么？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Yes, as the highest ranking nightkin alive, my voice speaks for all nightkin everywhere, ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}对的，作为仍然在世的最高阶层的夜行族，我所说的话就代表了整个族群的意志。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Which is why all super mutants should do what you say, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}也就是说所有超级变种人都应完全服从于你，对么 ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] That's right! My position of supreme authority must never be questioned!
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}你说对了！我至高无上的权力不容置疑！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] One last thing. Is there any truth to the rumor that all Nightkin are slightly crazy from their overuse of psychologically damaging pre-war tech?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}最后一件事。有谣言传说夜行族因为滥用战前对神经有害的科技，导致全族人都变得有点疯癫，这是事实吗？ ?
[塔比瑟}一派胡言，朗达。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] There you have it, Utobitha! Nightkin, your benevolent overlords, who are most certainly *not* crazy. We'll be back after this!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}现在你们听到了，乌托比萨！夜行族，你们的最高领袖，现在可以证实他们一点都*没有*发疯。广告之后更精彩！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Welcome, Utobitha, to another episode of Know - Your - Mutants!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}欢迎再次收听新一期的变种人面面观！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Today we're proud to have Best Friend Tabitha with us. Welcome to the show!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}今天我们很荣幸的请到塔比瑟和我们坐在一起。欢迎光临！ !
[塔比瑟}很高兴来到这里，朗达。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] So what type of mutant did you want to talk about this time, Best Friend Tabitha?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}今天我们来谈谈哪种变种人呢，我的好朋友塔比瑟？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] I thought I'd briefly talk about first generation Super Mutants, Rhonda.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}我想我们应该说说第一代超级变种人，朗达。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Oooh, what can you tell us about them?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}啊哈，你能告诉我们些什么呢？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] What we call the first generation of Super Mutants, Rhonda, were actually created by the Master himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}我们现在说的第一代超级变种人，朗达，是由主教本人亲自创造出来的。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Like everything the Master took a direct hand in, they were better than the ones who came later, the ones made by accident.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}看来只要是主教亲自做的事情，总会比后人要出色的多，比如后来那些因意外而产生的变种人。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] They were smarter, almost as smart as Nightkin, and were able to think and act for themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}他们更聪明，甚至和夜行族一样聪明，可以自由支配自己的意志与行动。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] However, the first generation seems to have some kind of suicidal urge that they can't control.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}即便如此，第一代变种人好像很容易出现自杀倾向，而且无法控制这种倾向。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] How terrible! What makes you say that, Best Friend Tabitha?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}那太恐怖了！为什么这么说呢，我的朋友塔比瑟？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] So far, all first generation Super Mutants that have come to Utobitha have left not soon after.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}至今为止，所有来过乌托比萨的第一代变种人都在不久之后就离开了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] How strange! Why would anyone leave the safety and comfort that Utobitha provides?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}匪夷所思！为什么他们要离开这么舒适安全的土地呢 ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Why, indeed. But now there's not a single first generation Super Mutant in Utobitha.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}为什么，问的好。但是据我所知没有任何第一代留下来。.
[朗达}除了尼尔。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Well! I think we've all learned something today. Let's go to music!
[Rhonda] You're listening to another edition of Know - Your - Mutants, with Best Friend Tabitha!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}欢迎再次收听变种人面面观！欢迎好朋友塔比瑟！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] So, Best Friend Tabitha, who will we learn about today?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}那么，我的朋友塔比瑟，今天又有什么新鲜事呢？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] I guess it's time we talked the dumb-dumbs.
[Rhonda] Oh, you mean the second generation Super Mutants who aren't so bright?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}哦哦，你是说第二代超级变种人吗，大脑不怎么聪明的那群人？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] That's them. Dumb-dumbs... ah... that is... they...
[Tabitha] Yes! They're just as big as other mutants, and as strong as they look. Beyond that, uh...
[Rhonda] And there's a lot of them.
[Tabitha] Oh yeah, dumb-dumbs are the most common type of mutant that most travelers will encounter, and make up more than half the mutants here in Utobitha.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}对，这群蠢蛋就是旅行者在大陆上经常能遇到的那种，居住在乌托比萨的变种人中，超过半数都来自他们的族群。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Best Friend Tabitha, some of our listeners may wonder how you can call them dumb-dumbs on the air like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}我的朋友塔比瑟，一些听众可能会好奇，为什么在广播中你要称他们为蠢蛋。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] That's a good question, Rhonda. The truth is, they're so dumb they don't even know that I'm talking about them right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}很有趣的问题，朗达。事实上，他们简直蠢到听不懂我在骂他们蠢。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] And that's another revealing look at mutantkind. Second generation Super Mutants. Big. Numerous. Dumb. More after this!
[Rhonda] What do you think we should play next?
[Tabitha] It doesn't matter, just grab something. And check on Raul while you're at it.
[Sounds of movement and something brushing against the mike, then a click as the feed gets switched to the mike in Raul's room]
[Raul singing in Spanish to himself for an extended time]
[Tabitha] Raul! Why are you on the radio?
[Raul] Uh, I don't know. Did you hit that switch I, ah, keep telling you not to press?
ESP.TRADUIT: [劳尔}呃，我也不知道啊。你切到我这边来的，啊，告诉过你不要按切换键的嘛 ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Click as feed switches back to Tabitha's room, some fumbling done near mike]
[Rhonda] Sorry about that, Utobitha! Here's some music!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}不好意思，乌托比萨！音乐时间！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Utobitha, I'm here with Best Friend Tabitha, who has a message for all the dumb-dumbs out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}乌托比萨，好朋友塔比瑟正和我在一起，她有重要信息要告知所有收听广播的蠢蛋变种人们。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] It has come to my attention that some of you dumb-dumbs took me a little too seriously in the past when I warned you about the battle cattle.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}我注意到当我提醒你们留心凯撒军团的崽子的时候，你们中的一些呆子表现得有点过于紧张了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] While battle cattle are indeed a dangerous foe, they are one that should be fought ferociously.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}虽然凯撒的小卒确实是可怕的敌人，但大家必须抱着拼死相搏的精神与他们战斗。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Recently I've heard about several incidents where some of you have been seen running away from a fight where battle cattle were involved.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}我最近偶有耳闻，说你们当中有的人在和凯撒军团发生冲突的时候临阵脱逃了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] This is not acceptable. No self-respecting soldier of Utobitha should ever be seen running like a scared little human.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}这是无法容忍的。乌托比萨的无畏士兵怎么会像懦弱的人类一样惊惶失措。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Bah, I don't even know why I try. It's not like the dumb-dumbs are even going to understand this.
ESP.TRADUIT: [塔比瑟}呸，我说这些干啥。好像这些蠢蛋们能听懂似的。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] You heard her, Utobitha! Beware the battle cattle, but don't *fear* the battle cattle. More after this!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达}大家都听到了，乌托比萨！小心凯撒军团，但是不要对他们心存*恐惧*。待会回来！ !

ESP.ORIGINAL: According to a new report, violent crime is on a sharp decline in New Vegas. The report credits the decline of the population of Fiends in the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有消息称，新维加斯近来的暴力犯罪率正在下降。报道将原因归结为该区域恶魔帮数量的减少。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: A big congratulations to a young band of soldiers who shattered NCR records on a combat readiness evaluation at Camp Golf. Go get 'em, guys!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一队年轻的士兵在高尔夫营地举行的训练考核中打破了NCR以往的记录。加油啊，伙计们 !

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tensions are brewing in Freeside between the ruling gang known as the Kings and the large number of NCR squatters seeking refuge there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由城的紧张局势正在进一步升级。本地帮派猫王帮与大量NCR外来移民之间的关系正在持续恶化。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Kings have been killed in a fight with NCR forces after weeks of mounting hostility. Witnesses report The King's last word was simply "Don't."
ESP.TRADUIT: 在持续数周的武力挑衅之后，猫王帮成员被NCR军悉数剿灭。有目击者说，猫王临死前只说了两个字"不要。."

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Kings gang in Freeside has put an official end to hostilities with the NCR. An RNV reporter was on-hand to speak with The King.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由城的猫王帮已正式终止和NCR的敌对状态。一位维加斯广播电台的记者正在和猫王交谈。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Several witnesses report a Vertibird flying in from the Northeast. One of them, using binoculars, claimed it was being flown by a group of old men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几位目击者声称在新维加斯东北方向看到了飞鸟。据其中一位使用了望远镜的目击者描述，这架飞机是由一群老人驾驶的。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mysterious deaths of several old men around New Vegas, including a doctor, have led some to suspect a serial killer may be responsible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新维加斯附近几个老年人神秘死亡，死者包括一名医生。这让人怀疑是连环杀手干的。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gomorrah is under new management after the sudden departure of Omerta bosses Nero and Big Sal. The Casino's new manager spoke to reporters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赌场的新任经理告诉记者。黑手党的老大尼禄和大萨尔的突然离去使得蛾摩拉的管理层经历了一次大换血。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sources close to the Omertas tell us a newcomer has been meeting privately with bosses Nero and Big Sal, unusual for a Family outsider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据黑手党的内部人士爆料称，有位外来人与老板尼禄和大萨尔举行了一次私人会面。对于家族以外的人来说，这非常少见。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] You're listening to Radio Free Utobitha, bringing truth to Utobithians 24 hours a day! Welcome!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 您现在收听的是乌托比萨自由频道，我们将全天24小时向每个乌托比萨人传播真理！欢迎收听！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Also joining us from his locked cell is Raul Tejada, master mechanic who can be executed at any time! Hello, Raul. Or should that be "Hola?"
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 同时，还有劳尔·特耶达，从监狱里专程赶来参加我们的节目！他是一名随时可能被处决的机械大师！你好，劳尔。或者说我该说[QUOTE]吼啦？[QUOTE]

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Ooooh, Raul. Supreme commander Tabitha says you die today. Any reaction?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 哦哦哦，劳尔。最高指挥官塔比瑟叫嚣你今天一定会死。对此你有什么感想?
[沉默。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] You're listening to UNC - the Utobithian News Channel - with breaking news!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 你们正在聆听的是乌托比萨新闻频道——马上发布震撼消息！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] The execution of master mechanic Raul Tajeda has again been commuted for a period of 24 hours to allow time for important repairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 由于需要处理繁重的修理工作，总工程师劳尔·特耶达的处决再次被推迟24个小时。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] <snarling> This time you will get it done, Raul!
ESP.TRADUIT: [泰贝莎] <咆哮>这次你必须把她修好，劳尔！
[劳尔] 你好，塔比-<哽咽着>朗达。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] What's your take on the situation?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 你对现在的情况有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Raul] All I want is to make that special robot work again, you know? I give it my best.
ESP.TRADUIT: [劳尔] 您应该明白，我现在唯一想做的就是让这个独一无二的机器人重新运转起来。我已经竭尽全力了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] We'll be right back after this word from our sponsor during which Raul will contemplate how lucky he is to be alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 接下来进一段赞助商广告，我们马上回来。同时劳尔将会重新审视自己能活着是多么的幸运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Did you kill some and they overreacted? Are two-head-bear people shooting at you, and battle cattle mooing? Beware the battle cattle...
ESP.TRADUIT: [泰贝莎] 你是否因为人类的反应过度而大开杀戒？那些加州佬是不是还会对着你们开火，凯撒的崽子们是不是还会对着你们大呼小叫？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda]<whispering a line prompt> "Leave the fear behind."
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] <随即喃喃自语>[QUOTE]置恐惧于身外。[QUOTE]

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Leave the Fear Behind. Meet at the Mountain Top! Enjoy life in a state of Utobitha - Free, Safe, Secure!
ESP.TRADUIT: [泰贝莎] 置恐惧于身外。居与山峦之巅！享受在乌托比萨的每时每刻吧——自由，安全，顺心！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] <rushing sotto voce like disclaimers at the end of prescription ads> Freedom limited to following the commands of Best Friend Tabitha...
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] <无法抗拒般的低声嘟囔>自由的前提是您必须遵循好朋友塔比瑟的命令……

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] <Cont.> Safety not guaranteed against siege or assault by two-head-bear people or battle cattles.
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] <继续>由于可能遭遇加州佬和凯撒牲口们的的围追堵截，此地并不保障安全。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] <Cont.> Many infractions are punishable by death, no allowances for dumb-dumb "misunderstandings".
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] <继续。>多数违令者都将被处死，不允许出现所谓的“误会”。
[泰贝莎] 乌托比萨！来感受全新的生活吧！
[朗达] 欢迎回来，乌托比萨。是时候了！
[泰贝莎] 什么时候，朗达？
[朗达] <唱歌>真理时刻！
[掌声响起。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] I see that you're already wearing the True Eyes, Best Friend Tabitha, along with your head of True Hair. What do you see?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 塔比瑟，我看到你已经拥有了真理之眼，还有了一头浓密的真理之发。你看到了什么?
[泰贝莎] 啊…我看到尼尔…

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Standing outside his shack down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: [泰贝莎] 站在他的窝棚外面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] In the same spot as before, or has he moved?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 还是站在原地？就没有挪个身子？
[泰贝莎] 一点点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Wow! It must be so exciting to see and know all. What a powerful reminder of your ultimate authority and power for our listeners!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 哇！这真是太令人激动了。再次向我们的听众证明了你的无上的权威和伟大的力量！
[泰贝莎] 我看到了阿萌…

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Licking the gate. Wants out of the pen.
ESP.TRADUIT: [泰贝莎] 舔着大门。想从圈中出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Now, I'm almost afraid to ask, but do you see any - you know - threats out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 啊！是的！那么，我虽然有点不敢问了，但你是否看到了……或者预见到了……威胁?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Threats all around us... converging... like a noose, tightening! Two-head-bear people astride battle cattles!
ESP.TRADUIT: [泰贝莎] 威胁从未离去，它一直萦绕在我们身边…就像一股绞索，越勒越紧！加州佬还有凯撒军团，他们是不会善罢甘休的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] <calmer> Would it be going too far to say that your gift of True Eyesight is the only thing saving our community from annihilation?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 我是不是可以这么说，只有你的真实之眼才能够阻止我们的族群遭受灭绝？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Because I think it's so important for everyone - even the dumb-dumbs - how impossible it is to sneak up on us! More after this!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 我觉得这对大家至关重要——甚至对那些蠢蛋也是——这种神迹竟然会悄悄的降临在我们身上！尤其在这种危难时刻！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumors continue to swell that Mr. House, the father of New Vegas, has passed away. Who will fill the power vacuum on the Strip remains uncertain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新维加斯之父豪斯先生去世的谣言正在不断传开。至于谁会来填补这一权力真空现在还无从得知。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Insiders are saying a key Legion prisoner has escaped Camp McCarran. The prisoner is armed and dangerous, and may be dressed as an NCR trooper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 内部消息人士声称一名军团的关键囚犯逃出了麦卡伦营地。犯人身上拥有武器且极度危险，另外他可能穿着NCR突击兵的制服。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Legion slaver party was wiped out in a failed raid of the Bitter Springs refugee camp, with two armed civilians inflicting heavy Legion casualties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团的奴隶贩子在袭击苦泉难民营时被消灭。两名手持武器的平民对袭击者造成了巨大伤害。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Bitter Springs refugee camp has been overrun by Legion slavers. Refugees should stay away, and avoid talking to strangers in football pads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团的奴隶贩子侵占了苦泉的难民营地。建议难民最好远离那里，并避免和穿橄榄球服的陌生人交谈。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: A hostage crisis between the NCR and Great Khans was resolved peacefully when a third-party negotiator successfully secured the hostages' release.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR和大汗帮之间的人质危机得到和平解决。一名来自第三方的谈判专家解救并释放了人质。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: A group of Great Khans were killed in a bloody end to a hostage crisis in Boulder City. It's not currently known why the Khans were in the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 巨石城的人质危机以大汗帮的人被杀而告终。现在还不清楚为何大汗帮的人会出现在那个地区。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few Great Khans are on the loose after an aborted standoff left at least two NCR hostages dead. The NCR is offering a reward for their capture.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两名大汗帮成员在谈判失败后逃之夭夭，事件已造成至少两名NCR人质丧生。目前NCR正在悬赏捉拿这两名逃犯。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Several unidentified aircraft were spotted flying over the REPCONN test site by a local crackpot. He spoke to a toy bear near one of our microphones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 数艘不明飞行物从REPCONN测试基地升空，一位当地的怪人向我们透露了这个消息，当时他正在麦克风边与一只泰迪熊交谈。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodsprings has fended off a mob of escaped convicts after organizing an impromptu militia, according to an old man armed to the teeth with dynamite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据一位用身上绑满了炸药的老人称，清泉镇组织了一支临时民兵队，赶走了来袭的暴徒逃犯。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sad news from Goodsprings. The town was wiped out after heavy fighting with a gang of escaped convicts. Travelers are advised to keep their distance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来自清泉镇的坏消息。该镇在和炸药帮的激烈交火中被完全摧毁。建议旅行者尽量远离此地。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Primm formally swore in a new sheriff today. RNV reporters were on hand to hear the new sheriff address the crowd.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天，普瑞姆的新警长正式宣誓就职。维加斯广播电台记者正在聆听新警长的演讲。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eyewitnesses outside Camp McCarran are reporting a large explosion near its monorail station. The NCR is denying the incident.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据麦卡伦营地外的一位目击者称，营地内的轨道站附近发生了严重爆炸。NCR否认了事故的发生。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's word from Camp McCarran that an attempt to bomb its monorail system was foiled by an alert civilian contractor. Security is being tightened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦卡伦营地传来消息，一位公民阻止了一起针对营地内单轨铁路的爆炸袭击。目前该地区正在提高安全警戒。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tops Hotel owner Benny has been killed by an unidentified assailant. His former right-hand man, Swank, consoled mourners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一名身份不明的攻击者杀死了九重天酒店的主人本尼。他的前副手斯万克已表示哀悼。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumors have surfaced that Tops Hotel owner Benny has taken yet another unexpected leave of absence. We spoke to his right-hand man, Swank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有谣言说九重天酒店的主人本尼再一次不辞而别。我们正在和他的副手斯万克对话。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have unconfirmed reports that Caesar has died in his base camp after a failed surgery, performed by an unknown and possibly unqualified surgeon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有未经确认的消息称，凯撒死在了自己的老巢里。在这之前，他很可能接受了一位不知名且医术不合格的大夫对他进行的手术。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're hearing rumors that Caesar may have been assassinated by an unknown party. It is currently unknown how the assassin was able to evade security.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有传言说凯撒已被某个不知名派别暗杀。现在还不清楚暗杀者是如何掩人耳目的。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reports out of Arizona quote Caesar as saying he's "never felt better" after undergoing emergency brain surgery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亚利桑那方面传来消息，援引凯撒的话，在接受紧急大脑手术后，他"从来没感觉这么好过"。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Strange rumors from across the river indicate a secret underground robot army has been destroyed before anyone was able to use it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 河对面传来奇怪的谣言，一支秘密的地下机器部队在被启动前遭到摧毁。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR flag has been hoisted over former Legion outpost Nelson after heavy fighting. NCR officials are calling this a big win for troop morale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 经过激烈的交火，NCR终于攻占了军团的岗哨纳尔逊。为振奋士气，NCR官方将其称之为一场大捷。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion raiders have sacked Camp Forlorn Hope, eliminating all remaining NCR forces there and giving the Legion a strong foothold along the river.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团洗劫了飘零希望营地。所有剩余的NCR部队均被剿灭，军团在河岸边拿下了一个坚实的立足点。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The president of the NCR has been killed at Hoover Dam. President Kimball was slated to give a rallying speech to troops stationed there.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR总统在胡佛水坝遭到刺杀。金博尔总统原计划对驻当地部队发表演讲。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: During his visit to Hoover Dam, an attempt on the life of NCR President Aaron Kimball was thwarted by a quick-thinking civilian.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR总统艾伦·金博尔访问胡佛水坝期间，一名反应迅速的平民阻止了一起针对他的暗杀。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Residents of Novac were treated to a surprise light show when HELIOS One unexpectedly began firing lasers. No word yet on the damage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 诺瓦克的居民近来欣赏了一次突如其来的灯光秀，太阳神一号出乎意料开始发射激光光。目前暂时还没有收到损伤报告。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Residents and squatters in Freeside are overjoyed after waking to discover that the area is being supplied with electricity from an unknown source.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由城的居民和流浪者在醒来之后惊喜地发现，城内突然有了电力供应。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: A source within the Great Khans is saying the gang has reached an accord with the NCR, and will support them in any conflict with Caesar's Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一名来自大汗帮的消息人士称，部落已和NCR达成协议，他们将会在NCR与凯撒军团的冲突中为其提供协助。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eyewitnesses report seeing roving bands of troops wearing power armor and carrying advanced weapons along the 95.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有目击者在95号公路发现大批身着动力装甲，携带重型武器的士兵正在行军。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Witnesses report a huge object or creature surfacing in Lake Mead. So far, photos of the so-called Lake Mead Monster are grainy and underexposed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目击者声称看见一只体型庞大的物体或生物在米德湖现身。截至目前，有关所谓米德湖怪的照片均过于模糊，而且曝光严重不足。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: A large unidentified aircraft has been seen circling the skies above the New Vegas Strip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在新维加斯长街上空发现有一巨大不明飞行物盘旋。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Residents of Novac were running for cover following the failed launch of three rockets from the REPCONN Test Site.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为REPCONN试验基地的三枚火箭发射失败，诺瓦克的居民正在逃向掩体。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR Correctional Facility is now under prisoner control following a successful riot. Locals should avoid anyone who looks like they've done time.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR监狱发生囚犯暴动，现监狱已被犯人占领。建议当地居民远离任何可疑人员。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR has failed to retake the prison it recently lost in a deadly riot. Powder gang operations against the NCR are expected to continue.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR试图重新控制发生暴乱的监狱，但行动以失败告终。炸药帮抵抗NCR的行动仍将继续。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Intense fighting erupted on Hoover Dam as tensions between NCR and Caesar's Legion boiled over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着NCR和凯撒军团的关系剑拔弩张，胡佛水坝上爆发了激烈的战斗。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: A grateful widow told Radio New Vegas today of one person's heroic efforts to recover her husband's body from a war zone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一位寡妇感激地告诉新维加斯电台，今天有一名英雄从战场上找回了他丈夫的尸体。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Food shortages and mass starvation are plaguing Freeside and the Strip in the wake of a sharp reduction in the area's beef supply.
ESP.TRADUIT: 食物短缺以及区域的饥荒正威胁着自由城。而长街的牛肉供给量也开始大幅下降。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beef prices around the New Vegas Strip have dropped significantly following an agreement between the Ultra-Luxe and Brahmin baron Heck Gunderson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奢华殿堂和双头牛大亨赫克·冈德森之间已经达成协议，目前新维加斯长街的牛肉价格已经大幅下降。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wealthy Brahmin baron Heck Gunderson was arrested in the Ultra-Luxe Hotel as a suspect in his son's murder. A hotel spokeswoman had this to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一名酒店的发言人声称：富裕的双头牛大亨赫克·冈德森因涉嫌谋杀其儿子而在奢华殿堂酒店遭到逮捕。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: A mob of dangerous creatures of all different species has been terrorizing locals in Westside. The cause of the attacks is thus far unknown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 西区居民近来遭到大量危险的野生动物袭击。发生袭击的原因现在暂不清楚。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Residents report briefly seeing a column of heavenly light coming out of the sky. Apocalypse predictors haven't been this excited since the War.
ESP.TRADUIT: 居民声称看见一道从天而降的天堂之光。天启追随者在战后还未如此兴奋过。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listeners have been unable to pick up radio broadcasts from Black Mountain recently. Most are calling the static, quote, a welcome improvement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 近期，黑山的广播突然暂停了。多数人认为电台正在进行改版，“将以崭新的面貌示人”。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Troubling news from Primm as merchants report a large presence of armed, unsavory figures patrolling the town. Residents are nowhere to be found.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一则来自普瑞姆的令人担忧的消息，商人们称看见一大批武装分子在镇上巡逻。而该地的居民全都不见了踪影。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Black Mountain radio signal is back after a long absence. Listeners say the new programming is, quote, less for outcasts, more for weirdos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长期停播的黑山电台信号现在恢复了。听众们认为，新节目“与其说是给流浪者听，还不如说是给怪人听”。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The HELIOS One solar power plant remains dormant despite NCR efforts to reactivate the facility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然NCR想要重启太阳神一号的太阳能电池板，但该设施仍然一直处于停转状态。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar's Legion continues to fortify its position in Nelson, where it remains a constant concern for Camp Forlorn Hope and the nearby town of Novac.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒军团继续在其纳尔逊湖的据点修筑防御工事，该据点的存在也令附近的飘零营地和诺瓦克惶惶不可终日。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scavengers report hulking individuals moving around Hidden Valley after dusk, but have been unable to identify them due to low visibility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有拾荒者爆料，有人在黄昏时分于隐谷附近看见了身着铁皮的行人。但由于能见度太低，无法辨别他们的身份。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The influx of displaced residents to the refugee camp at Bitter Springs has caused a strain on rations there. NCR officials are asking for donations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 居民仍在不断涌入苦泉镇的难民营地。当地粮食储备已经变得愈发紧张。NCR官方正在请求捐助。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Citizens of Outer Vegas are flocking to the Strip in droves amid a wave of terror caused by a band of raiders known as the Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维加斯外围的居民正在大批涌入长街，以躲避名为恶魔帮的掠夺者所制造的各种恐怖事件。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The death toll continues to climb around Camp Forlorn Hope, where Legion raiding parties are still chipping away at the NCR's hold south of the Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡的丧钟回荡在飘零希望营地上空，军团的进攻部队仍在和据守水坝南方的NCR部队激烈交火。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR officials at Camp McCarran were relieved when technical difficulties with its monorail line to the New Vegas Strip proved easy to fix.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通往新维加斯长街的单轨铁路技术难题目前已经被轻松修复，麦卡伦营地的NCR官员们都舒了一口气。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unconfirmed reports say NCR's General Lee Oliver may have uprooted from his post at Camp McCarran in order to be present at Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有未经确认的报道称，NCR的李·奥利弗将军将离开麦卡伦营地，进驻胡佛水坝。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Merchants are saying there's been little contact with traders from Nipton in recent days, causing concerns that the isolated town may be in trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 商人们声称近来与尼普顿镇上的货商联系愈发减少，许多人猜测这座与世隔绝的小镇已经遭遇不幸。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Refugees at Bitter Springs are giving startling accounts of the legate known as Lanius who is said to be Caesar's top field commander.
Traders from California are being turned away at Mojave Outpost, where the NCR is concerned about dangers along Nipton Highway and I-15.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR拒绝了来自加利福尼亚的商人进入莫哈维岗哨的请求，认为尼普顿高速公路和I-15沿段有危险。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumors persist about a Super Mutant refuge nestled high in a ski lodge to the Northwest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 传言有变种人躲藏在西北面的一个小屋中。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patrons of the Ultra-Luxe are questioning whether its pricey restaurant, the Gourmand, is overstating the fullness of its wait-list.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奢华殿堂的顾客们最近纷纷质疑，是否他们时常光顾的美食家餐厅在刻意夸大客流量。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Diners at the Gourmand are giving the restaurant rave reviews for executive chef Phillipe's brand new menu offerings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 美事家餐厅的用餐者对主厨菲利普的新菜给予了极高的评价。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sources at the Dam are telling us that the involvement of one key person appears to have heavily influenced the outcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大坝那边传来消息，一位关键人物的介入对事情的发展产生了巨大的影响。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reports indicate that NCR forces emerged victorious, and the Legion scattered amidst the defeat of its most feared military leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 报道称NCR方面取得了胜利，而军团也由于其首领的殒命而迅速溃败。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Preliminary word is that Caesar's Legion has taken control of the Dam, and that the NCR presence in Nevada is severely crippled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前的初步消息，凯撒军团已经控制了大坝，而NCR在内华达的势力被严重削弱了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: While it initially appeared to be an NCR victory, we're receiving word that our own Mr. House may have been the one to secure the Dam for himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管表面上看上去是NCR的胜利，但据我们获悉，豪斯先生或许才是真正保护大坝的那个人。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: But in a shocking turn of events, the Dam has been rendered useless, and both sides have taken heavy casualties. Neither faction appears to have won.
ESP.TRADUIT: 情况突发巨变，大坝好像已经彻底损毁，而双方都遭到重创，看来结果是两败俱伤。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: But in a shocking turn of events, an army of Securitrons has seized control of the Dam, preventing both sides from claiming it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但情况突变，一支电子保安军队控制了大坝，使得两边都未能占领这个战略要地。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The women of New Vegas ask me a lot if there's a Mrs. New Vegas. Of course there is. You're her. And you're still as perfect as the day we met.
ESP.TRADUIT: 女士们经常询问我是否有新维加斯夫人。当然有啦。就是你们，而且我对你们还犹如初见般一往情深。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Mr. New Vegas, fanning the flames of your passion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是新维加斯先生，你们的激情能给我最大的快乐。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Primm Slim] Loading Public Appeasement Oration... complete. Howdy... citizens. How about a yee-haw for law and order in the fine town of ERROR: TOKEN NOT FOUND?
ESP.TRADUIT: [PrimmSlim:}正在读取公众安抚演说…完成。你好啊…市民们，为我们的（错误：名称未找到）小镇迎来新的秩序而欢呼吧！ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Meyers] Howdy do, folks. I'm Sheriff Meyers. Be good, or I'll shoot you dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: [Meyers:}你好，伙计们。我是治安官梅耶。别做坏事，否则我会毙了你们。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [McGee] People of Primm, the NCR wishes to inform you that you are under their jurisdiction now. And from now on, you're gonna be living by our rules.
ESP.TRADUIT: [麦吉:}普瑞姆的居民们，NCR正式宣布，你们已被纳入NCR的管辖范围。从今天开始，你们将按照NCR所制定的法律生活。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Swank] If I know my pal Benny, he's swinging with the Big Cat Upstairs as we speak. Or he's chasing some angel broad with cans as big as her halo! <Laughs>
ESP.TRADUIT: [Swank:}就我对老兄本尼的了解，他现在应该正在楼上和老板闲扯，要么就是在和哪个漂亮的天使腻歪呢。>

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Swank] Do I seem worried to you, baby? Sometimes a cat just needs room to swing. He'll be back, sure as a conga drum's got a groovy beat.
ESP.TRADUIT: [Swank:}宝贝，你觉得我会担心吗？猫也有需要潇洒的时候。他会回来的，就像康茄鼓一样，他有自己的节奏。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once again, Caesar, dead. A shocking turn of events whose impact is anyone's guess at this point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 重复一遍，凯撒，死了。形势变化如此之快，以至于目前各方都来不及做出反应。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar said he expected to resume his campaign of terror and mayhem as soon as he receives medical clearance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒曾对外宣称，一旦等他接受治疗后并无大碍，他将继续自己的恐怖活动。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Sighs> Dang it. I could've used one of those.
ESP.TRADUIT: <叹息>见鬼。我也想体检一次。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar's Legion is believed to have been behind the attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据信这次攻击的幕后主使是凯撒军团。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: When asked why, the source said someone alerted them to the fact that Caesar's Legion was comprised of, quote, a bunch of squares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当问及原因，曝料人声称，有人警告他们凯撒军团是“一群不折不扣的老古董”。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travelers are advised not to make friendly chit-chat with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 建议旅行者最好不要随意与他们攀谈。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Freesiders are hoping they'll drop food. I wouldn't get your hopes up, Freesiders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由城的人希望他们能空投食物。我觉得你们最好别想得太美了，狱城的同胞们。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: In possibly related news, local chem dealers report an overall decrease in their standard of living.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一则相关的新闻，当地的药贩子声称他们的生活水平正在全面下降。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The leader of the Kings, who would only identify himself as "The King" voiced his displeasure, calling NCR citizens, quote, the devil in disguise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 猫王帮的老大，认为只有自己才是真正的"王"。为了表达自己的不满，他称NCR为披着羊皮的恶魔。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [The King] I feel so bad. I think it's time we reconsider, baby.
ESP.TRADUIT: [TheKing:}我感觉很糟。我想我们应该重新考虑一下，宝贝。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: No suspects have been identified, but seniors are advised to be on the lookout for the so-called Denture Killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 犯人还未落网，老年人仍要提防这位身份不明的所谓假牙杀手。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Cachino] Before he left, Nero told me him and Big Sal were real tired, see? Said they were gonna go camping up at Lake Mead.
ESP.TRADUIT: [Cachino:}尼禄在离开前，已经告诉我他和大萨尔都真的很累了他们说他们准备在米德湖扎营。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Asked to comment, Big Sal said, quote, the fuck you looking at? You wearing a wire? Are you? I'll break your fucking kneecaps. Hey. Get back here.
One witness said, quote, God sent us two angels. And at least one had him a .308 caliber flaming sword of justice with a telescopic sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个目击者说到，“神派了两个天使降世，其中一人拿着一把点308口径的烈焰剑，上面还带着瞄准器”。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [No-Bark Noonan] It's ghouls, I tell ya. Religious ghouls in rockets looking for a land to call their own.
ESP.TRADUIT: [No-BarkNoonan:}我说了是尸鬼了。一群信教的尸鬼，他们坐火箭是为了寻找新的家园。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Possible causes suggested were engineering mistakes, centuries-old equipment, and the fact that the rockets were piloted by a cult of crazy ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前认为造成事故的原因有以下几种可能：或者是工程失误，或者几世纪前的旧设施年久失修，更有可能是因为火箭实际上是由一群信仰邪教的尸鬼所驾驶。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Witness descriptions are remarkably similar to accounts of the Goodsprings courier who, as we reported, recently survived a gunshot to the head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目击者的描述与清泉镇的一位邮差非常相似。而据我们之前的报道，此人脑门中枪，目前刚刚恢复。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Private Morales] It was such an incredible thing he did, putting his life on the line like that for my husband. It's not something most people would do.
ESP.TRADUIT: [PrivateMorales:}他真的很令人敬佩，为了我的丈夫，他甚至不惜冒生命危险。这样的事情大部分人都不会做的。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Private Morales] It was such an incredible thing she did, putting her life on the line like that for my husband. It's not something most people would do.
ESP.TRADUIT: [PrivateMorales:}她真的很令人敬佩，为了我的丈夫，她甚至不惜冒生命危险。这样的事情大部分人都不会做的。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Marjorie] Mr. Gunderson is no longer a welcome guest at the Ultra-Luxe.
ESP.TRADUIT: [Marjorie:}冈德森先生已经不受奢华殿堂欢迎了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The attacks are all the more troubling since there has not been a zoo in the area in quite some time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于此地区没有建设动物园，这也使得事态变得更加棘手。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The chief scientist at the plant vowed to fix the problem, blaming it on an atmosphere of, quote, severe underappreciation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 电厂的首席科学家发誓会解决这个问题，他将原因归咎为自己长期得不到赏识。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those who can afford passports are saying the added security is well worth the price of admission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拥有通行证的居民告诉我们，新增的安保措施完全可以值回票价。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: One anonymous official told us a serious mechanical failure would be a disaster because of the age of the train and scarcity of replacement parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一位不愿意透露姓名的官员告诉我们，机械故障极有可能是导致事故的原因，列车早已年久失修，而备用的部件也十分短缺。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR sources say that holding the Dam against Caesar's Legion has become their main strategic priority, and this move would not be unexpected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来自NCR的消息，阻止军团夺取水坝已成为NCR的首要战略目标，而这一行动也早已在预料之中。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: One refugee told us the legate took over an underperforming squad of troops by beating its commander to death in full view of everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有难民告诉我们，他亲眼目睹副帅将一支表现不佳的部队的指挥官当众打死。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you should find it, do not - repeat, do not - belittle a Super Mutant for taking the bunny slope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你遇到它，千万不要，重复，千万不要因为超级变种人腿脚不便就小看它。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those who claim to have dined at the restaurant find the food appealing but say many tables remain empty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据在餐厅吃过饭的顾客说。虽然食物很诱人，但上座率依然偏低。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The secret ingredient? Tender loving care, according to the chef.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于秘密配方？据厨师说，就是细心与热爱。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The president's Vertibird exploded in midair as he departed following the address. Investigators say the explosion was not an accident.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当总统发表演说准备离开时，他乘坐的飞鸟突然在半空发生爆炸。调查人员声称，这次爆炸绝非意外。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The president's Vertibird crashed into the side of the Dam as he departed following the address. Authorities suspect sabotage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当总统发表演说准备离开时，他乘坐的飞鸟突然坠毁在水坝边上。当局怀疑原因是蓄意破坏。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The president's Vertibird was destroyed by one of the Dam's howitzer cannons. Investigators say the gun had been tampered with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总统的飞鸟被水坝上的榴弹加农炮摧毁。调查人员说这门炮曾被动过手脚。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: An assassin attacked the president in full view of the crowd, but was not apprehended. Witness descriptions of the killer differ wildly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一名刺客在众目暌暌之下袭击了总统，但目前该人尚未被绳之以法。目击者们对杀手的长相莫衷一是。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: An NCR private scheduled to receive an award exploded as he reached the stage, killing the president in the blast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一名原计划上台受勋的士兵在台上引爆了炸弹，总统先生在爆炸中不幸丧生。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: He added he didn't want to see the NCR in the ghetto, and called for a mass, quote, return to sender.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他补充说不想在贫民窟见到NCR，并号召大家要“以彼之道还至彼身”。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Cachino] Said he'd always wanted to sleep with the Lakelurks.
ESP.TRADUIT: [Cachino:}说他一直想和湖沼蟹同床共枕。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [No-Bark Noonan] Don't you laugh at me. I know a spell that'll make you show your true form. Cave rat taught it to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: [No-BarkNoonan:}不准笑我。我知道一句咒语，能让你显出原型。是地鼠教我的。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listeners are not advised to follow that path in hopes of similar results.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了避免此类事件再次发生，建议听众们远离那条路。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Private Morales] Esteban's going home now. I can't tell you what that means to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: [Private Morales:}埃斯特班终于回家了。对我来说，这真是意义非凡。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Marjorie] Nor is he allowed to sample the world-class cuisine of the Gourmand, New Vegas' only 5-star restaurant.
ESP.TRADUIT: [Marjorie:}我们也不会允许他品尝美食家餐厅的世界级菜肴了，那可是新维加斯唯一的五星级餐厅。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The legate then ordered a tenth of his own force be killed by the other nine tenths. And you thought your boss was a pain.
Once again, NCR President Aaron Kimball, dead at 48.
ESP.TRADUIT: 重复，NCR的总统艾伦·金博尔逝世，享年48岁。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: And we're back. This is Mr. New Vegas, and I feel something magic in the air tonight. And I'm not just talking about the gamma radiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们又回来了。这里是新维加斯先生，我觉得今晚的空气有些不同寻常。别理解错了，我不是在说这些司空见惯的伽马射线。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back to the program. This is Mr. New Vegas, and I hope I'm not comin' on too strong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回到节目中来。我是新维加斯先生，我希望自己没有打扰到你们。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're listening to Radio New Vegas, your little jukebox in the Mojave Wasteland. I'm Mr. New Vegas, and I'm here for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们现在听到的是新维加斯广播节目，每一个位于莫哈维沙漠荒野中的收音机都能收到。我是新维加斯先生，随时为您效劳。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, it's Mr. New Vegas, letting you know I've got a new Christmas compilation coming out soon. Nuclear Winter Wonderland. Look for it on holotape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我是新维加斯先生，想通知大家，在圣诞节期间我又有新作品要发表。核冬天里的仙境。快去买全息磁带吧。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to our program. This is Mr. New Vegas, and each and every one of you is wonderful in your own special way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 女士们先生们，欢迎收听我们的节目。我是新维加斯先生，祝大家能够一如既往度过精彩顺心的一天。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got some news for you, coming right up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来是新闻时间。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the latest news, coming your way right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即将播报最新的新闻。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you like news, you're gonna love our next segment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你喜欢新闻，你将会爱上我们下一段节目。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you know what that means, folks. Time for some news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，伙计们，让你们久等了。新闻时间到了。.
刚收到的消息。.
更多新闻。.
插播一段新闻。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just about time to get you some news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在该播报新闻了。.
现在是头条新闻。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoops, better put on my newsman fedora, here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，下面该戴上我的记者帽了。.
我这儿有一条新闻。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back, ladies and gentlemen. This is Mr. New Vegas. Thank you very very much for listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来，女士们先生们。这里是新维加斯先生。非常感谢你们收听。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: A package courier found shot in the head near Goodsprings has reportedly regained consciousness and made a full recovery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 清泉镇附近被射伤的包裹邮差据报道已回复意识。现在正在接收康复治疗。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello ladies and gentlemen. Mr. New Vegas here. You're all so great, we're gonna keep you listening all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 女士们先生们，大家好。我是新维加斯先生。您们是如此出色，我们要为你们广播一整天。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy folks, it's Mr. New Vegas, and I have a good feeling about all of you listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 朋友们好，这里是新维加斯先生。非常感谢依旧在收听节目的各位听众。我对你们的热忱非常感动。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that's a delivery service you can count on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样的快递服务，才是便捷可靠！.
其他新闻…...
其他头条…...
那我走了……..,
还有一则新闻…...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back to the Mr. New Vegas Show, the show with, in my opinion - which I respect - the best looking audience around. Somebody prove me wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回到新维加斯先生的节目，在我心中-发自肺腑之言-你们每一位听众都是无比美丽和帅气。我相信我的话无可辩驳。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me again, Mr. New Vegas, reminding you that you're nobody till somebody loves you. And that somebody is me. I love you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，新维加斯先生，又回来啦。我想提醒大家一点，只有当人爱你，你的生命才有意义。刚才提到的人就是我。我爱你们。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all for now. This is Mr. New Vegas saying, I'm just no good without you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新闻到此播送完毕。这里是新维加斯先生，没有你，我将一无所有。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know I think all news, whether it's good or bad, brings us closer together. Don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，我认为不管是好新闻还是坏新闻，都会拉近我们的距离。不是吗？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all I have for you. This is Mr. New Vegas, wishing you ladylike luck tonight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以上就是新闻的全部内容。这里是新维加斯先生，祝各位今晚好运。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boy, the Mojave Wasteland is just a fascinating place, isn't it? You never know what'll happen next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子，莫哈维废土是个迷人的地方，不是吗？你永远不知道将会发生什么。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll have more news for you at the top of the hour.
ESP.TRADUIT: 黄金时段，我们会有更多的新闻。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, they say no news is good news. But I think my program would be awfully dull if that were the case.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说没有新闻就是最好的新闻。但我认为如果那样子的话，我的节目会无聊透顶。.
以上就是我们的头条新闻。.
新闻播送完毕。.
请保持优雅，新维加斯。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojave, mo problems, am I right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维，没问题，对吗？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... Am I broadcasting? I'm broadcasting? Shit, ok. This is the NCR Emergency channel. It sounds like the Hoover Dam is under attack. Stay tuned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃……开始广播了么？开始了？妈的，好吧。这里是NCR紧急通信频道。胡佛水坝正遭受攻击。请保持联络。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rangers have managed to hold off a Legion attack at Camp Golf. Some casualties, but Camp Golf stands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵们在高尔夫营地外挡住了军团的进攻。虽然伤亡巨大，但是高尔夫营地还是保住了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rangers have barely managed to fend off a brutal attack at Camp Golf. The numbers had not yet been reinforced to replace the missing troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵们勉强守住了对高尔夫营地发起的冲锋。伤亡的士兵还没有补充到位。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Camp Golf has fallen! Apparently a small group of troopers broke rank and fled their posts once the battle began.
ESP.TRADUIT: 高尔夫营地已经沦陷！有一小队突击兵在战斗刚打响时就阵形大乱，落荒而逃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A group of troopers, that can only be described as rag-tag, managed to fend off a brutal attack at Camp Golf. I salute your bravery. Hold the front.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一小队突击兵，一群名不见经传的战士，竟抵御住了这次猛烈的进攻。我赞美你们的勇敢。坚守前线。
广播结束。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the news. This is Mr. New Vegas, filling in for Mr. New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以上就是新闻。这里是新维加斯先生，代班主播仍旧是新维加斯先生。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Troopers have managed to contain several small riots that were breaking out in the area surrounding New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 突击兵们已经控制住几处在新维加斯附近爆发的骚乱。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is chaos breaking out at McCarran. The Fiends are using the opportunity to attack the base.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦卡伦附近已经乱成一锅粥了。恶魔帮正在趁火打劫向基地发起进攻。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are also several riots breaking out in the area surrounding New Vegas. The looters have taken to the streets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在新维加斯附近有几处地区正在爆发骚乱。抢劫的人们已经充斥了整个街头。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is a confirmed report that the Legion mounted a simultaneous assault at Camp Forlorn Hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据可靠消息称，凯撒军团的人正同时对飘零希望营地实施突袭。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes Forlorn Hope has fallen. Some troops managed to fall back, but the fortification is lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，飘零希望营地已经沦陷。剩余的军队已经撤退，但防线已经崩溃了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forlorn Hope has sustained heavy casualties, but the fortification stands. We have successfully defended Forlorn Hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 飘零希望营地遭受了大量伤亡，但防线还在。我们终于守住了营地。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not getting any more information from Forlorn Hope. The Camp appears to have been totally overrun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在还没有收到从飘零希望营地传来的任何消息。看来营地已经完全失守了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm receiving reports that Forlorn Hope has been totally overrun, and the Legion is killing civilians as far as the township called Novac.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我收到消息说飘零希望营地已经完全被占领了，军团正在屠杀一个叫做诺瓦克小镇里的居民。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The troops at Forlorn Hope, assisted by First Recon, have repelled the Legion attack with very few casualties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 驻扎在飘零希望营地的部队，在第一侦察营的协助下，以极少的伤亡抵御住了军团的攻击。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The troops at Forlorn Hope, assisted by First Recon, have repelled the Legion in what will surely be the most decisive victory in this entire battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 驻扎在飘零希望营地的部队，在第一侦察营的协助下，抵御住了军团的攻击。就整个战局来说，是个大好消息。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the fuck is happening on the Strip? I'm getting reports that someone just bombed the embassy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，长街怎么了？我得到消息说有人把大使馆炸了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: It sounds like the Omertas are mounting some sort of attack on the Strip. They are receiving heavy casualties from the Securitrons and other casinos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来黑手党的人正在攻击长街。他们在面对电子保安和其他赌场人员的时候伤亡惨重。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The attack is coming from the Omertas. They are using some kind of gas to kill everyone in the casinos on the strip. How is this possible?
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击是来自黑手党。他们正在用某种毒气袭击所有长街赌场里的人。这怎么可能？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: The monorail at Camp McCarran just exploded. I'm not getting any reports of any fighting, but the monorail is gone for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦卡伦营地里的铁轨刚刚被炸毁了。我没有接到任何有关交火的消息，但是铁轨确实没了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: We aren't going to be able to reinforce the Strip against the Omerta assault there. How the fuck did this happen? Jesus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们现在没法增援遭受黑手党攻击的长街。这他妈的到底是怎么回事？天啊。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deploying battalion 14 to the southwestern flank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把第14营部署在西南侧方。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is some sort of obstruction on the road to Hoover Dam. We're going to do our best to send reinforcements around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好像在通往胡佛水坝的路上遇到了一些阻碍。我们会竭尽所能继续向那里增援。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unit 15 reinforce unit 16 at defense point sigma delta.
ESP.TRADUIT: 15小队增援16小队，防守点西格玛德尔塔。.
D队，重组。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: All units, be aware we are receiving help from a non-NCR military asset.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全体部队请注意，现在帮助我们的是一个并不隶属于NCR的不明武装。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Snipers in position. Repeat. Snipers in position.

ESP.TRADUIT: 第4小队增援第8小队。.
23小队等待42小队增援。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Location Bravo Bravo Charlie, the doctor is coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 方位：BBC，医生来了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: All unit commands, relay your current position and status.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有小队负责人，汇报你们的状况和位置。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're coming out of the walls man! They're coming outta the damn walls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们涌进来了！我操啊他们从四面八方涌进来了！！.

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Today you die, Raul! I command it!
ESP.TRADUIT: [泰贝莎] 你今天死定了，劳尔！我已经下定决心了！
[泰贝莎] 在这里我说了算！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] That was today's and every day's extra special guest, Best Friend Tabitha, supreme commander of Utobitha and Wearer of the True Eyes!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 现在来欢迎今天同时也是每天的特别来宾，我们最好的朋友塔比瑟，同时也是乌托比萨的最高统治者和真实之眼的持有者！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] I still miss you, Rhonda. After all these years...
ESP.TRADUIT: [泰贝莎] 朗达，这么多年过去了，我对你的思念丝毫未减……
[劳尔] 呣，都可以。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Raul] I going to obey supreme Tabitha, claro, whatever she say. Just I feel so bad I die before I fix her special robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: [劳尔] 我当然会听从至高无上的指挥官塔比瑟的命令。只是很遗憾，我还没能修好她的机器人，就得一命呜呼了。
[泰贝莎] <沮丧的咆哮着。>

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] We'll be right back after this musical interlude! Enjoy!
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 在欣赏完这悦耳的片段之后，我们马上回来！好好享受吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Joining us from his cell to comment on the situation is Raul Tejada. Raul?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 下面请正在服刑中的劳尔·特耶达说话。劳尔要自己评论一下目前的状况，请说吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Tabitha] Are you tired of getting chased because you're bigger than humans, and scaring them?
ESP.TRADUIT: [泰贝莎] 你是否已经厌倦了被四处驱赶的生活，仅仅因为你比人类高大，会吓着他们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] First-generation Neil from down the mountain? And what is he up to?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 山下来的第一代变种人？他在做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] Moe, the Centaur? Favorite Centaur Moe? What's he up to?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 阿萌，那个多脚兽？可爱的多脚兽阿萌？他在做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rhonda] <unnerved> Not the dreaded battle cattle training to hunt mutants?
ESP.TRADUIT: [朗达] 难道不只是那些可怕的凯撒战士们在训练捕杀变种人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those are our stories this hour. This is Mr. New Vegas signing off. Just kidding. I'm not going anywhere. My love for you is too strong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以上就是这个小时的新闻。新维加斯先生就此别过。说笑而已。我哪里都不去。我太爱你们了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: That news was brought to you by the Tops Casino. You'll dig us, baby! We're the Tops!
The preceding segment was sponsored by the Silver Rush. Silver Rush. Feel the rush of a warm laser in your hand.
Today's headlines were brought to you by Primm. Primm. The other New Vegas.
This program was brought to you by Gomorrah. Gomorrah. It'll be our secret.
Promotional consideration for this news segment has been paid for by the Ultra-Luxe. The Ultra-Luxe. Live life in the lap of luxury.
The news has been brought to you by the Vikki and Vance Casino. Vikki and Vance. Be our partner in crime.
These headlines were brought to you by Vault 21. Vault 21. Everything's better when you experience it in a vault.
Ladies and gentlemen, you're listening to me, Mr. New Vegas, and you look extraordinarily beautiful right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 女士们先生们，现在你们听到的就是我，新维加斯先生，你们一定格外美丽英俊。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now, I'd like to play one of my very favorite songs for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么现在，请允许我为你放一首我最爱的歌。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ladies and gentlemen, this next song goes out from me to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 女士们，先生们，这首歌是我为你们点的。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: More classics coming right up for you. So stay tuned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下去将会播放更多的经典歌曲，所以请不要换台。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Coming up, I've got some tunes I think you all are gonna like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，我这儿的旋律你们一定会喜欢的。.
下面，再进点音乐。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to play something special for you right now. Because you deserve it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想给你们放一支特别的音乐，因为你们值得这样的享受。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna love this next song. I guarantee it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会爱上接下去这首歌的，我保证。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: More tracks. Coming your way. Right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下面，再进点音乐。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy. My name is Jed Masterson, and I'm a caravan boss for the Happy Trails Caravan Company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。我的名字叫杰德·马斯特森，我是“欢乐小径”商队公司的老板。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're hearing this, I have a job offer for you. Happy Trails is organizing an expedition north into Utah, off the Long 15, and we need people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你正在听这条广播，我可以告诉你，我们向你提出一份工作邀请。“欢乐小径”商队正在组织一次前往犹他的远征，我们将沿着15号国道前进，现在正在征集人手。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're looking for caravan guards, prospectors, couriers - if you're used to humping it across the Wastes straight toward trouble, we want you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们正在寻找商队守卫、登山老手，以及向导。如果你有任何一方面的才能，请及时和我们联系，我们需要你这样的人才。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've got a Pip-Boy, we definitely want you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有哔哔小子，那再好不过了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the other hand, if you're a greenhorn or a city-slicker spinning tales about your skills, you can kindly go hang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相反，如果你只是个涉世未深的毛头小子或街头混混，那就找个墙角自己撞上去吧。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we like your gumption, we'll pay you square and treat you fair. Find me, Jed Masterson, at the Northern Passage if you're interested. Luck to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你的进取心能让我们满意，那么我们将给予你丰富的报酬和奖励。好了，如果你感兴趣的话，请到北部通道来找我。祝你好运。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stick around. We've got some great songs coming up for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要换台，我将为你们带来动听的歌曲.

ESP.ORIGINAL: This next song is... just magical. I hope you enjoy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下去一首歌……有点魔幻，我希望你们能喜欢。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: This next song helped me through a very difficult time in my life. I hope one day it can do the same for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下面的这首歌帮我度过了我生命中最困难的一段时光。希望有一天它也能激励你们。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got some songs coming up for you right now. At least one is probably about love.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在将会为你们播放一些歌曲。其中至少有一首是关于爱情的。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Radio New Vegas, and I'm your host, Mr. New Vegas. And in case you're wondering if you've come to the right place, you have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是新维加斯频道，我就是你们最忠诚的新维加斯先生。如果你们还在犹豫是否调错了频道，我可以告诉你们，绝对没有。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gonna play a song for you right now. It's about that special someone you only find once... in a Blue Moon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下面为您播放一首歌曲，你一直思念着的那个人……就在《蓝月亮》。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got some Dean Martin coming up, talking about the greatest feeling in the world, love. "Ain't That A Kick in the Head." Sure is, Dino. It sure is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将播放些迪安马丁的歌，关于这世间最伟大的感情——爱，"不就是当头一棒"。没错，迪诺，就是这样的感觉。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Has your life taken a turn? Do troubles beset you? Has fortune left you behind?
If so, the Sierra Madre Casino, in all its glory, is inviting you to Begin Again.
Come to a place where wealth, excitement, and intrigue await around every corner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，数不尽的财富，激情和秘密正等待着您。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stroll along the winding streets of our beautiful resort, make new friends... or rekindle old flames.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您可以沿着度假区美丽的街道在微风中漫步，结交新的朋友…重燃旧的激情。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let your eyes take in the luxurious expanse of the open desert, under clear starlit skies. Gaze straight on into the sunset from our Villa rooftops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在星光璀璨的天空下尽情领略沙漠广袤的美景，在别墅区的天台上欣赏壮丽的夕阳。.
还有无数娱乐设施正等待着您。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gamble in our casino, take in the theater, or stay in one of our exclusive executive suites that will shelter you - and cater to your every whim.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您可以在我们的赌场中豪掷千金，在剧院里陶冶情操，或是入住我们的高级行政套房，在这里实现您的一切突发奇想。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if life's worries have weighed you down... if you need an escape from your troubles... or if you just need an opportunity to begin again, join us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果生活的重担压得您喘不过气…如果您需要一个摆脱烦恼的心灵港湾…或是一个机会来开启新的人生，那就加入我们吧。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let go and leave the world behind at the Sierra Madre grand opening, this October. We'll be waiting.
Everyone, please, may I have your attention.
Guests, and residents of the Villa alike, I ask you to step outside and look to the night sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 各位贵宾，各位别墅区的居民，请与我一同走向户外，眺望今晚的夜空。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the moment you've been waiting for, the reason we're all here - the Gala Event, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre Casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你们期待已久的时刻，也是我们欢聚于此的原因。这场庆典，标志着马德雷山脉赌场的盛大开幕。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are the ones who have made this momentous occasion possible, and for that, we thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你们令这一伟大的时刻变为现实。在此，我们向您表示衷心的感谢。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: So raise your glass in celebration - let music fill the streets, fireworks light the sky, and promise of new beginnings fill your hearts.
No matter what your fortunes, no matter what your cares, let go this night, and begin again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论富有贫穷，无论高低贵贱，今晚，都请您放下手中的一切，迎接新的开始吧。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suggest you hurry, though - the gates of the Sierra Madre are open, but only for a brief time.
After that, the doors will close for the evening's festivities, and won't open again until morning.
Wait a moment, before you go.
I... we... hope you've enjoyed your stay.
Farewells can be a time of sadness. Letting go... difficult. As a guest of the Sierra Madre, you know that truth more than anyone.
Frederick Sinclair believed one's life could be made anew every day, that fortunes were more than the wealth in your hands.
Love. Life... family, those to care for, and those who will care for you.
To those who know these joys, the Sierra Madre holds little they don't already have.
Out in the world, beyond these walls, that is your chance to begin again.
I hope you'll return, in happier times. Until then, the Sierra Madre... and I... will hold you in our hearts.
Here's Bing Crosby reminding us of those times when you absolutely have to kiss the person you love. "Something's Gotta Give," up next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下面这首来自宾·克劳斯贝，它能让你回想起与所爱之人拥吻的美妙时刻，"爱是妥协。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey New Vegas, have you ever said you loved someone when it wasn't quite true? Sure you have. But you shouldn't. Because It's a Sin to Tell a Lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，新维加斯，你是否曾经说过爱着某人但口是心非？你当然说过。但你不应该这么干。因为撒谎是罪恶。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still can't figure out why I lost the signals...
There's no reason why it could have gone wrong, had it all planned out... maybe it was the curse of the Sierra Madre.
Damn Cloud still in my lungs, rattling around.
Good thing I installed radios in the collars, Pip-Boy's letting me pick them up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好在我已经往项圈里安装了无线电接收器，哔哔小子可以让我找到它们。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell is 21 doing now... hnh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 21号现在到底在干嘛…唔。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fool better not decide to sleep. Vitals go down, I'll get someone else to do this job.
Unnn... sitting too long. Damn arthritis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔…坐的时间太长了。该死的关节炎。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come too far to go back now. Too far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走得太远，不能回头了。太远了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hnh. Going to wipe the slate clean. Kimball, the Republic... Hardin, McNamara, my "brothers." Then I'll head back West.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼。要把他们统统消灭。金博尔，共和国…哈丁，麦克纳马拉，还有我的"兄弟们" 。然后再往西。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Better loop some instructions in case something happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好将一部分指令循环播放以备不测。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Going to get inside this place if it's the last thing I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算剩下最后一口气，我也要进去。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Running out of volunteers. Last ones couldn't see beyond their own greed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快要没有志愿者了。上一队人马被贪婪蒙蔽了双眼。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: If only people would do what I say, wouldn't need these damn collars to keep them in line. Keep going for each other's throats like dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果人们肯听我的话，就不需要用这些项圈来约束他们了。他们总是像狗一样互相撕咬。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wish I... still had that damn Holorifle. Spent forever making it... need to find it when this is all done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真希望…那把全息步枪还在我身边。为了研制它，我花费了无数心血…等这一切都结束，我就去把它找回来。.
发生了什么？ ?

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Gala Event... finally. Probably wake up half the things in town.
Power's fluctuating in here... getting some systems waking up, good, good.
Now all they have to do is just get here. Tired of waiting.
Hurry... hurry... you just need to get inside, I'll handle the rest. Come on, you fools.
Not far now... soon, the Sierra Madre's mine. Doors won't hold open forever... just like the last time. Come on.
All right, now everything's coming together...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，事情终于有转机了……...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just need to keep their gears turning a little while longer...
ESP.TRADUIT: 只需要让它们的齿轮再多转一会…...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't believe this old Pip-Boy saved me. Even if it led me to that damn signal in the first place.
Good thing the new recruit had a Pip-Boy, too, probably stole it from a Vault 21 dweller. Still, a thief's just what I need for this.
If only the others would've obeyed orders half as well as this one... should have thought of linking the collars together the first few times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前那帮人要是能和现在这家伙一样听话，哪怕就听一半……我早就该想到把项圈接在一起的。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good thing I can still hook into the Villa speakers by remote...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好在我依然可以远程遥控别墅区的喇叭…...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn Hologram tech. Worthless as security... better as weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 混蛋全息影像科技。用在安保上一文不值…更适合做武器。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell are they doing out there. Hurry up, you idiots, I don't have a few more years to waste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们到底在干嘛。快一点，你们这些白痴，我可没剩下几年时间了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outwitted by doors. Hermetically sealed doors don't protect anyone, all they do is seal us in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 居然被几道大门给难倒了。密封的门保护不了任何人，只会把我们关在里面。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the owner tied all of this to the Gala Event, insanity... backwards thinking, having a festival be your key. No wonder the bombs fell.
And now Nat King Cole, reminding us what really matters with "Love Me As Though There Were No Tomorrow." Because in New Vegas, hey, you never know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来的演唱者是纳京高，他将用"爱我即使没有明天"这首歌来让我们明白，生命中最重要的是什么。因为在新维加斯，嗨，你永远不知道将来会发生什么。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got a song for you, now. It's about a guy who's cold on the exterior, but deep down, you know he's a good man. And his name... is Johnny Guitar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我为你准备了一首歌。讲的是一个外表冷漠，但内心深处，你知道他是个好人的故事。他的名字... 是约翰尼·吉他。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you hear me? Signal should be stronger in here. I'll set this on loop... just in case I need to step away for a moment.
When the bombs hit, this casino sealed up like an Emperor's tomb. If you don't know what that means, never mind, it means we're trapped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核弹落下的时候，整座赌场就像皇陵一样被牢牢封上了。如果你听不懂这句话也没关系，反正我的意思是，我们现在被困住了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: So - get the power running to the main floor. That'll open the elevators and unlock the doors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你得想办法重启主楼的电力，这样电梯才会启动，各扇门的门锁也会解除。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ones that didn't strip their gears when they locked into place, Old World junk. Shoddy workmanship.
Once the power's on, then I'll tell you your next steps. Just get this part done, and then listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等通电之后，我会告诉你下一步怎么做。先把这件事办完，再来找我。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're wondering where your crew is, well... the casino saw them as guests. Which means they all got assigned to their floor. Just like mine.
Don't worry about them, they're of no use if you can't get the power running.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心他们，如果恢复不了电力，他们也没有用处。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I need is you for the rest of this. Which means we just need to deal with them, one by one, and then the Vault's... ours.
Ha! You got the power on, excellent. You were quite a find, glad my trap in the desert caught you before time ran out.
And also glad you didn't come across this place first, might have plundered it first... can't have that. Like at HELIOS. And Hoover Dam.
All right, setting this on repeat in case you're some idiot-savant braincase and need the reminder...
So, my greedy friend, we've got some unfinished business. I'm not one to share, and there's loose ends we need to wrap up first.
The rest of your team is on different floors. They got assigned there, ushered there based on the casino's records as to the best "fit."
Don't ask me how, Pre-War casino security and escort systems aren't my specialty.
Go to each floor, and kill them. I don't need them anymore... well, now that you're here.
We don't need anyone... except each other. Together, we'll crack the Sierra Madre, and we can both leave this place behind.
Now... if anything about our little heist went smoothly, you'd go to the Vault... except it's locked by some code I'm not familiar with.
The door to the casino vault is hidden in the Executive Suites, without the means to unlock it, it's useless.
Find a way to open it, bypass the code, then we'll talk.
You did it... a voice lock. Why would he have done that? Uh! Never mind.
Now I just need you to go below, look around. See if there's any other surprises down there.
I'll be along once you've found the Vault. No need risking myself just yet.
In New Vegas, we know the pain that numbers can bring us. Well, so does Guy Mitchell, who's got "Heartaches by the Number."
ESP.TRADUIT: 在新维加斯，我们知道数字会带给我们的痛苦。是的，盖·米切尔也知道，于是他给我们带来了"伤心百回"这首歌。."

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bravo, come in, Bravo. Is anyone out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 大本营，听到了吗，大本营。有人听到么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I warned you to cooperate. Now I'll have to begin again.
The camp was attacked. I think I'm the only one left alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 营地被袭击了。恐怕我是唯一生还的人了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you die, I'll be waiting...
Heh... now, come on, you open up. Open up, damn you.
Open the vault... I can make it worth your while, think about what you're throwing away. I have other weapons, other technology I can share with you.
And the Big Empty... I know the way there. I know some of its secrets... if...
The collars... the collars were a mistake, I see that now. Why would I kill you? After all you've done... after all we've done together.
Everything down here... I swear... so much you could use, you could rule the wastes with what's down here...
...make your own army, re-shape the world, and if others disagree... put collars on them, I can show you how.
Don't you leave me here. You can't do this to me.
Eh? Getting dark in here. Machine... machine's losing power, no. I still have Pip-Boy light... maybe... maybe... no, no, that doesn't work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃？这儿变黑了。机器……机器没有能源了。不，我还有哔哔小子的灯……或许……或许……不不不，没用，这没用。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where... where is the door. Can't find the door.
Calm, been in worse situations... find a way out... somehow, then find that Courier...
Maybe Veronica... no... no, she thinks I'm dead.
Must be someone... maybe that other courier, one with the flag on his back... maybe... no... no, said he'd never come to the Sierra Madre...
No way out. Can't... can't end like this.
You. I know you can hear me. When you die, Courier... I'll be waiting. Your grave's going look just like this vault.
When you die... I'll be waiting here... at the Sierra Madre. Waiting.
We were attacked by some kind of freak mutants from the caves. Please send backup!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们被附近洞穴中的变种怪物袭击了。请尽快增援！
